artist: artist: Denis Tegetmeier; author: Laurence Sterne; printer: Hauge & Gill, High Wycombe, England; publisher: The Limited Editions Club
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: Full tan buckram; gold-stamped lettering; design stamped in blue and red; endpapers: white laid; slip case: textured blue vinyl over cardboard; printed label affixed; type: Bunyan; deckle-edged, two, top edge gilded; 154 pp.
markings: Watermark: <J.B. Green> in script <1934 J.B.> in script
title: A Sentimental Journey Through France and Italy
